### safelyCreateIndexedStream() {#a2b840dcb0c3ba0d43c8c847fb0327a06}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; MappedBlockStream &gt; &gt; PDBFile::safelyCreateIndexedStream (uint32&#95;t StreamIndex) const</>}>
Wrapper around <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/mappedblockstream/#a17d9ec7154acf6bc5c1a090db9ef2936">MappedBlockStream::createIndexedStream()</a> that checks if a stream with that index actually exists.

If it does not, the return value will have an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msferror">MSFError</a> with code msf&#95;error&#95;code::no&#95;stream. Else, the return value will contain the stream returned by <a href="#af19aa92bb14252a64ac03c4ff7bf36a1">createIndexedStream()</a>.
